name: Create new employees in Deputy from new Typeform submissions
description:
This template creates new employees in Deputy based on new submissions in Typeform.

The template expects your Typeform to have these fields:
1) First name as short text
2) Last name as short text
3) Email as email
4) Phone number as phone number
5) Street as short text
6) Postcode as short text
7) City as short text
8) State code as 2-digit short text
9) Country code as 2-digit short text
